title: Rain Dancer
content:
Rain Dancer Uncommon 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning Create Water Main Hand OnlyTopple A pale staff inlaid with droplet-shaped topaz. It is cool to the touch. Gale can absorb this item's magic, destroying it. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 100

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning

Main Hand OnlyTopple

A pale staff inlaid with droplet-shaped topaz. It is cool to the touch.

Gale can absorb this item's magic, destroying it.
